description:
Balaji Astro Guide – Your Ultimate Astrology & Horoscope Companion
 
Balaji Astro Guide is your all-in-one astrology app: enjoy free AI astrology chat, connect instantly with India’s top verified astrologers via live chat or call, and receive accurate predictions, personalized remedies, and expert guidance for every area of life.
 
Special Launch Offer
Your first chat with a AI astrologer is FREE!
 
Expert Astrology Services:
Balaji Astro Guide offers deep insights and solutions via:
Vedic Astrology
Hindu Astrology
Tarot Card Readings
Numerology
Palm Reading
Prashna Chart
Vastu Shastra
Panchang
Kundli & Kundli Milan
 
Key Features
Chat or Call with Live Astrologers – Connect instantly with verified experts.
Daily, Weekly & Monthly Horoscopes – Personalized forecasts for every zodiac sign.
Free Kundli & Compatibility Matching – Discover your perfect match.
Personalized Remedies & Guidance – Tailored solutions for career, love, health and more.
Verified Astrologers – Experienced professionals with trusted reviews.
 
How to Connect
AI Chat: Ask questions and get guided answers instantly.
Chat with Astrologer: Unlimited questions via live chat with real astrologers.
Call with Astrologer: Recharge your wallet and get personalized voice consultation.
 
Topics We Cover
Career & Business: Job growth, promotion, financial success.
Love & Relationship: Find love, get your ex back, solve relationship issues.
Marriage & Matchmaking: Kundli Milan, marital harmony, matchmaking.
Education: Choose the right stream, enhance academic success.
Health, Wealth & Luck: Remedies for peace, prosperity and well-being.

Balaji Astro Guide – Where Technology Meets Astrology.
Download Balaji Astro Guide now and start your Free AI Astrology Chat today! Let your stars guide you towards success, happiness and peace.

Experience the world of Airtel. Perplexity Pro AI worth ₹17000 is free for all Airtel users. Claim it on Thanks App along with easy recharges, hassle-free bill payments, call manager, data balance check and instant UPI transactions. Get amazing cashback and discount coupons on Airtel Payments Bank and Airtel Wallet transactions. Download the app to explore the new design and its many unique features.

Airtel 5G Plus
Airtel becomes the first operator to launch 5G in India. Airtel 5G Plus delivers up to 30x faster speed than 4G which allows the users to download heavy files in just a few seconds. You can now experience 4K video viewing without any buffer on your devices. All this can be done, without changing your existing SIM. Experience the 5G Plus journey seamlessly on Airtel Thanks App.

Mobile Prepaid Recharge
Access plan details, data usage, expiry date through a single card available in real-time on the app. Never miss a due date, get prepaid recharge reminders on the App homepage.
Easily add multiple Airtel accounts and recharge online for all of them on Airtel Thanks App

Postpaid
Enjoy a hassle-free experience, where you can browse, choose your suitable plan and make bill payments within minutes.
Access data usage, bill date through a single card available in real-time on the app.

DTH
Recharge your DTH connection on the Airtel Thanks app to get exclusive offers and cashback with every DTH online recharge. Track your connection validity, add/remove Channels, get quick help on the app.

Broadband
Get the best broadband deals with an option to upgrade your existing plan and make your monthly broadband bills payment with ease. Enjoy office-like internet with a new connection of Airtel Xstream Fiber ranging from ₹499 to ₹3,999.

UPI Money Transfer
Enjoy lightning-fast safe and secure UPI money transfer on the Airtel Thanks app. Scan any QR code and make contactless online payment to any merchant.

Call Manager
Call Manager is a functionality in Thanks app for all Airtel mobile users. With this feature, we will enable users for the first time to track all the calls and alerts in a single place – calls which went through and those which got missed due to network not being available at caller’s end. User will be notified about all the calls they missed while they were out of network or the person they were calling was out of network, exclusively on the Airtel Thanks app.

Pay Utility Bills
Electricity, water, gas, Postpaid, piped gas, and others- the Airtel Thanks app is the only app you'll need to pay all your utility bills within minutes.

Airtel Payments Bank
Open a Safe Second Account with Airtel Payments Bank anytime, anywhere in minutes.
- Scan & Pay on any QR, transfer money, pay utility bills or make instant mobile & DTH recharges
- Safe Banking with Fraud Alarm, Manage Limits & Sleep mode
- Set up Autopay for OTT, loan EMIs, insurance premiums, Load Cash & Auto Load money
- Buy or Recharge NETC FASTag

Unique Features
- ‎Store up to 2GB data on Airtel Cloud for free and never delete anything you love.
- ‎Manage multiple Airtel accounts in one place
- ‎Get free OTT subscriptions such as Hotstar, Netflix, Amazon Prime with Prepaid, Postpaid, DTH, and Fiber plans
- ‎Explore latest news in the Discover section
 
Wait no more, enter a world of convenience and benefits with the Airtel Thanks app. Download NOW!

Pinterest is a place of endless possibilities. You can:
- Discover everyday inspiration
- Shop styles you love
- Try and learn something new

Create boards, save Pins and make collages of all your inspiration. Unlock billions of ideas, from fashion tips and easy recipes to DIY projects and fresh ways to redo your space. Creating the life you love? 

It's Possible.

Here’s what life in your District looks like:

Movies
Book tickets at the city’s best theatres and cinema screens, including PVR Inox, Cinepolis, Miraj Cinemas and more. Watch blockbuster films like Kaantha, De De Pyaar De 2, Now You See Me 3 and 120 Bahadur. Enjoy seamless booking and immerse yourself in unforgettable storytelling.

Events
The best nights (and days) out start here. From the Messi G.O.A.T India Tour 2025 to iconic music festivals and concerts like Sunidhi Chauhan - I Am Home India Tour and Dr. Satinder Sartaaj’s Heritage India Tour, discover shows everyone will be talking about.

Activities & Attractions
Find the city’s most exciting experiences, all in one place. Explore Wonderla, Imagicaa, Smaaash, Timezone and more, from theme parks and adventure zones to indoor gaming and family-friendly outings with The Great Activities Festival. These aren’t just weekend plans. They’re memories waiting to happen.

Dining
Find and book the best restaurants and cafes in your city, all in one place. From brunches and date nights to group dinners and post-work drinks, discover places for every plan. Book tables, pay through the app and unlock 10% cashback on every dining bill.

Stores
Your favourite brands are now on the app. Discover new-season drops, curated finds and trending picks across fashion, beauty, home and more. Explore store locations near you and get extra rewards when you pay through the app.

Your city, one app
Download District and make going out the best part of your day.

Our Services

-Free Kundli and matchmaking services 
-Free Daily, weekly, monthly and yearly horoscopes
-Live session with famous astrologers
-Chat with Astrologers instantly
-Talk to Astrologers on call in real-time
-Shop from AstroMall for remedies

HOW TO CONNECT WITH ASTROLOGERS?
1. Talk to Astrologer - Recharge your wallet and start a call with any Astrologer you like and speak.
2. Chat with Astrologer -Chat with any astrologer of your choice and ask as many questions as you want.
3. Live Session with Astrologers - Directly ask for an astrological solution to your problem in a live session conducted by India’s top Vedic astrologers at a low price.

TOPICS WE CAN HELP YOU WITH:

CAREER: Are you at the crossroads of your career? We can assist you in choosing the right path.
- When will I get a job?
- When will I get promoted?
- When will I get a change in my job?

 RELATIONSHIPS: Struggling in your relationships? We can provide you with remedies to find or bring back the love of your life
- When will I get into a relationship?
- Will my ex come back to my life?
- Can I get married to my boyfriend?

MARRIAGE OBSTACLES: If you are concerned about your marriage or married life, our astrologers can help you out.
- When will I get married?
- I am Manglik. What should I do?
- Will our marriage survive or go to divorce? 

EDUCATION: Not sure about which stream is better for you amongst Engineering, Commerce, Humanities, Medical, Arts etc; our astrologer can help you choose the right direction.
- Will I clear my exams?
- Which stream is the best for me?

CHILD NAME SUGGESTION: Excited to name your child as per the nakshatras? 
- What is the best name for my newborn child?
- Which is the best time to have a naming ceremony?
- Is this name lucky for my child?

- COMMODITY TRADING CONSULTANCY: Wanna be a trader but unable to adjust to the fluctuating commodity market? Let us help you
- Should I invest money in the market?
- Can I make money in trading?

- MATCH-MAKING: Looking out for some profiles but are unsure about which one would be right for you? We will match the Kundlis from all aspects and provide a detailed report.
- Are we compatible?
- Is he the right person for me?

- ABROAD SETTLEMENT: Frustrated about not getting any opportunity to work in a foreign land? 
- Can I settle abroad?
- Will I find a job outside India?

- REMEDIAL CONSULTANCY: Feeling something is wrong with you? Know the Upchaar (remedy) but don't know how to do it? Let us help you.
- I have a weak Saturn, what should I do?
- I am not getting the results of my effort, what should I do?

- GEMSTONES CONSULTANCY: Because astrology is not about expensive gemstones, rather you must understand the value of gems that bring good luck to you.
- Which gemstone should I wear for success in business?
- I get angry easily, which gemstone can keep me in control?

Based on the questions asked, our astrologers provide you with the most accurate astrological predictions along with remedies if needed.

OUR TOP ASTROLOGERS:
We have 1500+ Top Astrologers of India, who provide instant solutions to love, relationship, marriage, career, health, and property-related problems. We don't use any software or computer-generated predictions.

Disclaimer: Astrotalk is a marketplace for experts in astrology, numerology, psychic and tarot reading. Astrotalk charges for the chat/call service offered on this platform on a per-minute basis and holds no responsibility or liability for the reality or reliability of the astrological effects on human psychology by any products or services represented or sold.

Download the app and choose from a bouquet of services whenever you need. It’s that simple.

Beauty and Wellness:
Some days demand a pedicure, others a full-blown glow-up. With Urban Company, the salon comes home to you, literally. Get services such as: salon/ beauty parlour at home, spa at home, party make-up, massage at home, haircut for men, skin consultation, waxing, manicure, pedicure, facial, and cleanup

Repairs:
Got a light that won’t turn on, or a tap that just won’t turn off?  Book trusted Handymen, plumbers, electricians, and carpenters.

Book expert technicians for all your repair needs: AC repair, washing machine repair, refrigerator repair, RO/ water purifier repair, microwave repair, geyser repair, TV repair, chimney repair, stove repair, Aircon Repair.

Insta Help:
Househelp on leave? Get househelp in 15 minutes, trained to be a home cleaner, housekeeper, and even a meal-prep assistant. Join the 20k+ happy customers served by our 4.7+ rated professionals.

Superior filters that need no service for 2 years, 10-stage purification with RO, UV, Alkaline, and Copper charging, thoughtfully designed beyond factory-mold builds, and IoT-enabled for real-time water and filter quality tracking.

Home Improvement & Decor:

Snabbit is India’s first Quick Service app for house cleaning services, providing instant cleaning help for all your household needs. We provide House Help in 10 minutes for all home cleaning services like dishwashing, laundry, and weekly home cleaning.

Currently, we provide House Help in Mumbai, where we have served over 10,000 customers and are constantly expanding to newer geographies.

Why Choose Snabbit?

Verified Home Help – All our experts are police-verified and trained to provide expert cleaning assistance and home task assistance to our users.

Flexible Services – You can book our house cleaning services and get an expert at your doorstep within 10 minutes. You may also choose to schedule a home cleaning booking for later using the “Prebook” feature.

Freedom To Reschedule – You may choose to reschedule your house cleaning service without any penalty, 30 minutes prior to the start time.

Reliable Services – Snabbit has a team of well-trained home cleaning experts who have served more than 10,000 families in Mumbai with their home cleaning services.

Doorstep Cleaning Experts – Using our home service app, you can book trained professionals at your convenience. 

Timely Cleaning – You can book a service on an hourly basis for up to 4 hours at a time and schedule it up to 4 days in advance with the Snabbit cleaning tasks app.

Affordable Home Help – Our house cleaning services start at just ₹169 per hour! Within this time, you can have our House Help assist you with any chores you need.

What House Cleaning Services Do We Provide?

Snabbit provides all types of home cleaning services, including kitchen cleaning help, dishwashing services, laundry services, and bathroom cleaning help.

- General Cleaning for Home – You can book daily cleaning services on Snabbit to get help with floor cleaning, dusting, ironing clothes, and light furniture cleaning.
- Weekly Cleaning for Home – Our home cleaning experts specialise in bathroom cleaning help, fan cleaning, kitchen cleaning help, window cleaning, and curtain cleaning—taking care of areas that often get ignored.
- Quick Laundry Service – Get your laundry done fast with expert cleaning assistance. Washing, laundry folding service, and drying clothes have never been easier!
- Kitchen Prep Service – Our trained experts can assist with kitchen cleaning help, cutting and chopping fruits and vegetables, and even cleaning the dishes while you cook.
- Dishwashing Services – Snabbit offers dishwashing services to help you clean your utensils, sink, and kitchen counters with ease.

How To Book Home Cleaning Services On Snabbit?
Snabbit makes home help booking simple and hassle-free!

1. Log into the Snabbit home services app with your mobile number and submit the OTP. 
2. Set your location to check if instant cleaning help is available in your area.
3. Choose your slot and hit checkout for a home cleaning booking.
4. Our home cleaning experts will arrive within 10 minutes.
5. Share the OTP, and our expert will handle all your cleaning tasks.

Benefits Of Choosing Snabbit’s House Cleaning Service
Snabbit’s instant cleaning help is a game changer for anyone dealing with unplanned housemaid leaves, work refusals, or ignored tasks like bathroom cleaning help, fan cleaning, and kitchen cleaning. Our House Help are professionally trained for all household chores and undergo a thorough background check. They wear uniforms and follow professional standards. This ensures our customers get the best home task assistance at their doorstep.

So, if you’re tired of searching for ‘maids near me’ every time your housemaid is absent or on an uninformed leave, Snabbit is the home service app for you.

Tirumala Tirupati Devasthanams (TTD) is an independent Trust manages Lord Sri Venkateswara Swamyvari Temple in Tirumala including its allied local temples. The trust oversees the operations & finances of the most visited Hindu Religious Temple in the world. With a moto to provide hassle free services to Srivari devotees, TTD continuously updating its online portal and Mobile App services.

TTD is presenting updated Mobile App with much more improved features like user friendly UI, pilgrim friendly login using mobile number and OTP, Notifications for real-time updates, Live streaming of Videos & Audios, ease of availing / booking services like Special Entry Darshan, Accommodation, Srivari Sevas etc., including Hundi & donation offering acceptance and other services.

HINGE, DESIGNED TO BE DELETED
Hinge is the dating app for people who want to get off of dating apps. With profiles that show your personality through text, photos, video, and voice, you have unique conversations that lead to great dates. And it’s working. Currently, people on Hinge go on a date every three seconds. Additionally, in 2022, we were the fastest-growing dating app in the US, UK, and Canada.

HOW WE GET YOU OFF HINGE
When it comes to online dating, people are so busy matching that they’re not actually connecting, in person, where it counts. Hinge is on a mission to change that. So we built an app that’s designed to be deleted. Here’s how:

* We quickly learn your type. You’ll only be introduced to the best people for you.

* We give you a sense of someone’s personality. You’ll get to know potential dates through their unique answers to prompts, as well as information like religion, height, politics, dating intentions, relationship type, and much more.

* We make it easy to start a conversation. Every match begins by someone liking or commenting on a specific part of your profile.

* We want you to feel confident about meeting people in person. Selfie Verification makes it easier for daters on Hinge to ensure that they are who they say they are.

* We ask how your dates are going. After exchanging phone numbers with a Match, we’ll follow up to hear how your date went so we can make better recommendations in the future.

The app is free to use. Members looking to see everyone who likes them or send unlimited likes can upgrade to Hinge+. To access additional features, including enhanced recommendations and priority likes, we offer HingeX.

PRESS
"It's the go-to dating app for many people looking for love." - The Daily Mail
“Hinge’s CEO says a good dating app relies on vulnerability, not algorithms.” - Washington Post
"Hinge is the first dating app to actually measure real-world success" - TechCrunch

SUBSCRIPTION INFO

Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
Account will be charged for renewal within 24-hours prior to the end of the current period
Subscriptions may be managed and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to Account Settings after purchase

The dating app bringing people closer to love

Bumble is the dating app where people meet, make connections, and start their love stories. We believe meaningful relationships are the foundation of a happy, healthy life — and we're here to help you find yours with a commitment to member safety and tools that empower confident dating.

Match with the right people, date, and find meaningful connection

Bumble is a free app for meeting singles and building connections grounded in mutual respect and trust. Whether you’re ready to find the one or date for fun, Bumble can help you connect with real people to build something authentic.

As champions of love, we prioritize creating a space where our members feel respected, confident, and empowered to make connections

- Our members are at the heart of everything we do
- We put safety first — so you can date with confidence, knowing you’re connecting with verified matches
- Respect, courage, and joy guide how we show up — and inspire others to do the same

Try our free features — built to make dating easier
- For better connections, conversations, and dates, personalize your profile with interests and prompts to showcase who you are, what you’re into, and what you’re looking for
- Trust that the person you’re talking to is real with ID Verification
- Feel confident with expert-backed dating advice designed to help you succeed
- See what music you bond over by linking your Spotify account
- Video chat and share your favorite pictures with your matches to get to know them better
- Chat with peace of mind — knowing that when you’re talking to new people, all messages must meet our community guidelines
- Get extra reassurance by sharing the details of your meetups with someone you trust
- If you’re ever in need of a dating break, hide your profile with the Snooze Mode (you'll still keep all your matches)

Want even more ways to connect? Bumble Premium unlocks extra features to boost your dating experience
- See everyone who likes you
- Use Advanced Filters like “What are they looking for?” to meet people who share your values, hobbies, and goals
- Rematch with expired connections — so you don’t miss out on a great potential date
- Browse anonymously with Incognito Mode and only seen by who you want to see you
- Extend your matches by 24 hours
- Swipe as much as you like to meet more people
- Tap into dating scenes around the world with Travel Mode
- Stand out and get noticed with free SuperSwipes & Spotlights, refreshed weekly

Inclusivity is key
At Bumble, we promise to support and include all forms of love: straight, gay, lesbian, queer, and beyond. We want everyone in our community to feel safe and welcome. So no matter how you identify, if you're looking for a place to chat, date, and find real love, we’ve got what you’re looking for.

---
Bumble is a free dating app to download and use. We offer optional subscription packages (Bumble Boost & Bumble Premium) and non-subscription, single, and multi-use paid features (Bumble Spotlight & Bumble SuperSwipe). Your personal data is securely processed in line with our privacy policy and applicable laws—be sure to read our privacy policy and terms and conditions.
https://bumble.com/en/privacy
https://bumble.com/en/terms
Bumble Inc. is the parent company of Bumble, Badoo, and BumbleBFF, social networks, and dating apps free to download and use.

MATCH, CHAT & DATE. IT STARTS WITH A SWIPE™.
With 97+ billion matches to date, Tinder® is the top free dating app and the best place to meet new people, with safety features that work to help you date more safely. Looking for love? An open relationship? Trying to find a date or new friends to chat with? Connect with local people everywhere on Tinder and get the best out of your dating experience:

Come As You Are: whether you're straight, gay, bisexual or anything in between, you can be who you are and find who you want on Tinder.
Date Beyond Photos: share your interests and learn more about your matches to get the conversation started.
Seek What You’re Looking For: set your relationship goals and make connections on your terms.

HOW TINDER WORKS
It’s easy and fun to find new people on Tinder®. Express yourself to make your personality shine in your profile and stand out to potential matches. Answer a prompt, share a little about you and show your face in your pics to increase your match-making potential. Use the Swipe Right™ feature to like and the Swipe Left™ feature to nope. If they like you back, It’s a Match! And with our double opt-in feature, it’s only a match if the interest is mutual.

PUT SAFETY FIRST
Try some of our safety features to help you make connections more confidently:

– Share My Date: share date plans with friends and fam, so they know who you’re planning to meet up with and where
– Get Photo Verified: verify your photos to help potential matches know it’s really you in that cute pic & increase your chances of matching
– Are You Sure / Does This Bother You: Tinder detects inappropriate language so people think twice before sending a disrespectful message
– Report a Profile: quickly report and block profiles with suspicious activity or inappropriate behaviour
– Block Contacts: take control and block anyone (like an ex) you don’t want to see on the app
– Video Chat: hitting it off in chat? Test your online dating chemistry and meet new people from home!

TRY TINDER PLUS
– Unlimited likes for you to catch feelings for as many new people as you want
– Use Passport Mode™ to match and chat with locals anywhere in the world before you arrive
– Unlimited Rewinds to undo your last like or nope
– Go Incognito and be seen only by the people you like

EXPERIENCE TINDER GOLD
– Get everything in Tinder Plus™, and try it out for a week before you commit to a monthly subscription
– See who likes you and match with them on the spot for faster connections
– Monthly Boost puts your profile to the top for 30 minutes to help increase your profile views
– Weekly Super Likes, because sometimes you really, really like someone

UPGRADE TO TINDER PLATINUM
Get most of Tinder’s premium features: join Tinder Platinum™ to get your likes prioritised with potential matches, send them a compliment before matching and more.

So what are you waiting for? Join millions of people worldwide! Tinder offers the most daters, increasing your chances of finding exactly what you're looking for. Download the best free dating app today!

––––––––––––––––––––
If you choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, payment will be charged to your Apple account, and your account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. Auto-renewal may be turned off at any time by going to your settings in the App Store after purchase. No cancellation of the current subscription is allowed during the active subscription period. If you don’t choose to purchase Tinder Plus®, Tinder Gold™ or Tinder Platinum™, you can simply continue using Tinder for free.

PURE is a dating app for curious people to show up in their most playful version of themselves. It’s a space to be honest with your intentions and clear in your boundaries.

Let your imagination go wild and get ready for amazing dates!

* HOW PURE WORKS?
Everything starts with Personal Ads. To see other people in the feed, you need to post your Ad. Write what kind of experience you are looking for and find someone who would share the same experience with you. Be creative and original with your ads, that's always appealing.

* IN PURE ALL BORDERS ARE OPEN
Paris, New-York or London? You can check any city worldwide and meet people from PURE community from around the globe.  

* WHAT HAPPENS IN PURE STAYS IN PURE
Photos self-destruct right after being seen, and in case someone takes a screenshot, you will get a notification about that. Also, all chat messages, including photos and audio, shared in chats cannot be saved to the phone's gallery.

* OUR MISSION IS TO KEEP PURE A PURE EXPERIENCE
Safety of our community is one of our key priorities. We are constantly improving our algorithms to find and get rid of scam and spam accounts, also our system sends automatic alerts on trigger words that might be used by scammers, so don't be surprised in case you will get a warning. 
Keep chatting anonymously via PURE and do not switch to other messengers. You know what they say: better safe than sorry. 

PURE uses auto-renewing subscriptions — you have to subscribe to get inside.
Here’s what you should know about PURE subscriptions:

- If you choose to purchase a weekly, monthly or annual subscription you will be able to go online and interact via chats with other users during the chosen subscription period. The prices may vary per country and are subject to change with a notice. Prices are clearly displayed in the app.
- All subscriptions renew automatically unless you cancel at least 24 hours before the end of the current subscription period without any limitations.
- Auto-renewal can be canceled at any time by going to your settings in the Apple Store after the purchase.
- All personal data is handled under PURE’s privacy policy https://pure.app/content/en/privacy

Mygate is India’s largest, best & most comprehensive community & accounting management app for gated communities. Trusted by over 4 million households across 30+ cities in India.
Mygate ERP is built to simplify life inside gated communities. From paying society bills to raising complaints, booking amenities, managing visitors, and staying connected with your neighbors, Mygate brings every aspect of community living into one app. It is the most powerful & comprehensive tool for RWAs and management committees with end-to-end ERP features for accounting, billing, helpdesk, communication, staff oversight and more. 

Designed for Residents:
Society & Home Payments
• Pay maintenance, sinking fund, utilities, rent, or clubhouse charges
• Supports UPI, credit/debit cards, net banking, and auto-reminders
• Instant receipts, downloadable payment history and reconciliation
Book Amenities in Real Time
• Reserve gym, clubhouse, tennis court, guest rooms, and other shared spaces
• Set duration, pricing (if applicable), cancellation policies, and block repeat defaulters
• Slot-based availability ensures fair and transparent access
Helpdesk & Maintenance Requests
• Raise complaints with issue photos and notes
• Get notified when tickets are picked up, resolved, or escalated
• Track service timelines and complaint history
Domestic Help Management
• Find verified maids, drivers, cooks, car cleaners, and more
• View ratings, work history, and availability in your community
• Track attendance automatically and make monthly payments
Visitor & Delivery Management
• Approve visitor entry in one tap via app notification
• Enable “Leave at Gate” for contactless package handover
Community Communication & Directory
• Get official notices, AGM invites, and polls from your RWA
• Participate in discussions, share classifieds, or start conversations with neighbors
• Use the resident directory to contact fellow residents
Local & Home Services
• Book electricians, plumbers, pest control, appliance repair, and other verified vendors
• Transparent pricing, resident reviews, and doorstep support
• Curated marketplace available directly inside the app

Best ERP Tools for RWAs:
Accounting & Billing
• Auto-generate maintenance bills and track collections
• View defaulter lists, dues breakdowns, and real-time collection dashboards
• Integrate with society bank accounts and tally reconciliation
• Accept payments via UPI, cards, wallets, or net banking
Helpdesk & Complaint Resolution
• Manage resident issues with SLAs and auto-escalation
• Assign staff or vendors to individual tickets
• Download reports for meetings or audits
Staff & Vendor Oversight
• View daily attendance logs for security guards, housekeeping, gardeners, and more
• Rate vendors, view contracts, and manage service schedules
• Keep track of AMCs and vendor documents
Document Vault
• Upload and share society documents: AGM minutes, bylaws, notices, etc.
• Control access based on resident, block, or flat level
• Available on both app & web dashboard
Polling & Surveys
• Create polls and voting sessions for residents
• Enable secret ballot options for AGMs
• Track participation and final results
Community Dashboard
• Get a complete overview of payments, complaints, security alerts, visitor logs, and more
• Designed for MCs, RWAs, facility managers, accountants, and auditors

Data Security & Privacy:
• GDPR-compliant and ISO 27001:2022 certified
• All data is encrypted, purpose-limited and retained only as needed
• Users have full control over their personal information
• Permissions are requested only when features require them
Optional Permissions We Request:
• Contacts – for inviting friends and family
• Camera & Gallery – for uploading photos in posts or tickets

※ Services and features may vary depending on your product model and your country or region of residence.

The following access permissions are necessary for the ThinQ app. 
All the access permissions requested are optional access permission, so even if you do not allow them, you can still use the app except for the related services. (Including OS Request Permissions such as "Siri & Search", "Notification", "Background App Refresh", and "Cellular Data")

[Optional Access Permissions]
• Location
- To find and connect to nearby Wi-Fi when registering the product.
- To set and save the home location in Manage Home
- To search for and use information about current locations, such as weather.
- To check your current location in the "Smart Routines" function.

• Camera
- To take a profile picture
- To share a home or account scanned from a QR code.
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product..(미국 Only)
- To use the AI oven Cooking Record feature.
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information 

• Photo, Media, File
- To use the smartphone's storage when downloading the information of the product to be connected
- To take and attach photos in "1:1 Inquiry."
- To record and store purchase receipts when registering additional information about the product.
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.
- To use in “Chat with LG” to save photos/videos of product symptoms or proof of purchase
- To use in “Chat with LG” when entering the product and serial number information

• Media and Apple Music
- To view photo/video on your smartphone on the TV.

• Microphone
- To check product status via Smart Diagnosis
- To use in “Chat with LG” when inputting through the microphone in the input window and using STT.

• Local Network
- To obtain the device connecting Wi-Fi info when adding devices

• Bluetooth
- To find and connect to nearby Bluetooth devices when adding a product to the app.

• HomeKit
- To add IoT-based products

• Notifications
- Notifications are essential for receiving updates on product status, important notices, benefits, and information.
